title: Zoe club reminder (GET IN QUICK)
body:
Spots are filling up fast my Zoe club aims to be the most active place for all Zoe players in OCE
Tag is #Zoe

Comment below with a cool reason you want to be in this club and ill add you to it!

Most people will get in but lets try keep those negative players away as Zoe is so innocent..

replies.body:
Opinions are like assholes.
Everyone has one, and they all stink.

I like anime as much as the next person, but this champ looks like a joke.
Talk about cheese factor.
Zoe looks like anime fan service, to the max.

On the other hand, the manga/anime "Blade of the Immortal" came out as a live action film, if you know it, watch it.
Actually she is more disney than anime
all these single champion fan clubs are cringe
Opinions are the death of us :D
